description:
nova-novncproxy is still trying to import openstack.common.cfg so it fails in a recent Grizzly devstack.

Submitting this bug so we can track it for the G release.

Fix here, thought I would give nova people a chance to review it before I submit a pull request:

https://github.com/conkiztador/noVNC/compare/nova-cfg
title: Update nova-novncproxy for the oslo.config change

comments.content:
nova-novncproxy is still trying to import openstack.common.cfg so it fails in a recent Grizzly devstack.

Submitting this bug so we can track it for the G release.

Fix here, thought I would give nova people a chance to review it before I submit a pull request:

https://github.com/conkiztador/noVNC/compare/nova-cfg
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kspear

comments.content:
Kieran,

Please submit using the openstack gerrit system. details are below 
https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/How_To_Contribute#If_you.27re_a_developer.2C_start_here:

thanks,
dims
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
Ah, I didn't know about nova/bin/nova-novncproxy. That's been fixed already.

Turns out this was an old issue from devstack where it used https://github.com/kanaka/noVNC/utils/nova-novncproxy. It has since been fixed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kspear
